designation: Nanyang Assistant Professor, School of Computer Science and Engineering
biography: Siqiang Luo is an assistant professor at the School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanyang Technological University. He received his B.S. and M.S. degrees in computer science from Fudan University, in 2010 and 2013 respectively. He received a Ph.D. degree in computer science from the University of Hong Kong in 2019. He was a postdoc fellow at Harvard University from 2019 to 2020. His work was published in premier database, data mining and machine learning conferences, such as ACM SIGMOD, VLDB, ICDE, ICML, WWW and ACM CIKM.
